pr_title: Rename field name constants in AbstractBuilderTestCase

timeline.message:
Rename field name constants in AbstractBuilderTestCase

Some field name constants were not updaten when we moved from "string" to "text"
and "keyword" fields. Renaming them makes it easier and faster to know which
field type is used in test subclassing this base test case.

timeline.bodyText: This is the most relevant change, the rest should be just renames according to this part.
timeline.author: cbuescher
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -376,9 +377,9 @@ public void onRemoval(ShardId shardId, Accountable accountable) {
 
             if (registerType) {
                 mapperService.merge("_doc", new CompressedXContent(Strings.toString(PutMappingRequest.simpleMapping(
-                    STRING_FIELD_NAME, "type=text",
-                    STRING_FIELD_NAME_2, "type=keyword",
-                    STRING_ALIAS_FIELD_NAME, "type=alias,path=" + STRING_FIELD_NAME,
+                    TEXT_FIELD_NAME, "type=text",
+                    KEYWORD_FIELD_NAME, "type=keyword",
+                    TEXT_ALIAS_FIELD_NAME, "type=alias,path=" + TEXT_FIELD_NAME,

timeline.bodyText: Renaming here, according to the field types used below
timeline.author: cbuescher
